name: Sky Wranglers
description:
In Sky Wranglers you assume the role of an air traffic controller and must manage the crowded skies to help aircraft safely navigate their way to safety. Guide airplanes to their destinations before their fuel supply runs out, keep flights on the right track, and avoid any mid-air mishaps!

This game is in early stages of Alpha development and will continue to evolve with new builds posted every few weeks.

The game is currently provided for "Free" due to the early nature of its development. If you enjoy the game and you want to help us as we continue to develop feel free to donate/name your price. As we make progress towards our Beta and official releases it will move to a "Paid" pricing model and have a scaling purchase price added to it. So the price will start as a fraction of the final price based on the current state of the game, and it will rise as the game nears completion to its final full price is reached at launch of the finished game.

Visit us at: SiliconForgeStudios.com
